java.lang.Object

All Implemented Interfaces:
GssConnectionResource, GssEnabledResource, HttpgServiceResource, Resource, ServiceResource, WebServiceResource
public class BaseHttpgServiceResource
extends BaseWebServiceResource
implements HttpgServiceResource

Base abstract implementation for httpg service resources.

authenticates

public void authenticates(org.ietf.jgss.GSSCredential credential)
                   throws org.ietf.jgss.GSSException,
                          ResourceException
Description copied from interface: GssEnabledResource
Tests whether the given credential successfully authenticates to this service resource. Throws exception if authentication fails. If no exception is thrown, we assume the credential succesfully authenticated a user to the service.

Specified by:
authenticates in interface GssEnabledResource
Parameters:
credential - The credential
Throws:
org.ietf.jgss.GSSException
ResourceException
